channel.title: Christmas Wishes Granted!
channel.description: What did you get for Christmas?!?!

item.title: Christmas Wishes Granted!
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

flj0yter0p:

I ran out of paper, otherwise i’d take another photo from a different angle in the same room with the same money you see.

http://www.usnews.com/usnews/news/badguys/070322/jackpot_seizures_of_drugs_cash.htm
http://www.usnews.com/usnews/news/badguys/070322/jackpot_seizures_of_drugs_cash.htm
http://www.usnews.com/usnews/news/badguys/070322/jackpot_seizures_of_drugs_cash.htm

It’s showing your “present”, with “‘Jackpot’ Seizures of Drugs, Cash” as the title. We all know you’re lying, just stop.

Topic: I got a backlit wireless keyboard which I’ve been wanting for a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Wishes Granted!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:246, topic:371243”][quote author=flj0yter0p link=topic=467328.msg3449590#msg3449590 date=1293654412]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=467328.msg3449151#msg3449151 date=1293620072]

Lol i’m showing off my Christmas money and you’re talking about photoshop, wtf.

Cause its obviously a picture of money you found on google and shopped the paper in?

Could of fooled me.

Look at the angle of the light in the background, vs the angle of light on the paper.

EDIT - http://www.usnews.com/usnews/news/badguys/070322/jackpot_seizures_of_drugs_cash.htm
[/quote]I used one of those modern textbook’s paper and somehow it reflected the camera’s flash.

Why would i go through all of that just to lie? No point.
[/quote]You’re lying pretty bad right now, it’s very obvious that it’s edited.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Wishes Granted!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:224, topic:371243”]How many of you got your parents(legal guardians!) something? I got my dad a Pink Floyd dark side of the moon blanket, and a book about the making of “The wall”.(its one of his favorite bands) I got my mom a colts snuggie! and a colts coffee mug(her favorite football team.) and yes I used money I made >.>

Me I got a hunting knife(for skinning going to use when fishing :D), a new fishing pole and some bait, and xbox live again for a year ^^[/quote]
Gimme dat live! Lol, anyways, Yea, I got my G’Ma/G’Pa a $30 gift card to Olive Garden, was all the moeny I had left, and I wasn’t expecting to get anything. Rest of my family (except my uncle) lives outta state. My uncle and I never get eachother anything though, not sure why.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Wishes Granted!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

I got some pants, a new bed and like 40$. I gave about 2000$ in presents this year idk why all you guys are so hung up on stuff, i would much rather have all my loved ones have something nice then have money sitting in the bank greedily.

Haha, my entire family was shocked when they didn’t get the usual answer outta me from the “what ya want for HOLIDAY HERE” questions. Normally I would say ‘idk’, but this year, I was the one that said ‘nothing, just for everbody to be happy’ lol. If you knew whats been going on though, you would completely understand.

Read full topic
